component.name: eRadio
component.summary: A minimalist and powerful radio player for elementary OS

description.p: eRadio is a radio player designed for elementary OS with native desktop features such us: Sound indicator integration, Media Keys Support, Notifications.
It support many stream types including m3u, pls, asx and has a webradio URI scheme to easily add new stations from your internet browser
You can also backup and import radio stations via erpkg files
